results.title: Rare case of spot diagnosis of nephrotic syndrome in a Saudi male.
results.text_hl: Renal biopsy revealed features consistent with @DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_Membranoproliferative @DISEASE_MESH:D015432 @@@membranoproliferative glomerulo- nephritis (MPGN) type II@@@ [@DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_Membranoproliferative @DISEASE_MESH:D015432 @@@Dense Deposit Disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Dowling_Degos_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562924 @@@DDD@@@)]. He was treated with @CHEMICAL_Prednisolone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011239 @@@prednisolone@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Mycophenolic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009173 @@@mycophenolate mofetil@@@ with partial remission.

citations.NLM: Askar A, Mushtaq F, Al Shuaibi F, Mustafa M, Bappu A. Rare case of spot diagnosis of nephrotic syndrome in a Saudi male. Saudi J Kidney Dis Transpl. 2011 Sep;22(5):1003-7. PMID: 21912033
